rules.description: Tap 'Left_Command' to enter layer_44
In layer_44, pressing slash (/) sends right_arrow (â†’)
In layer_44, pressing grave_accent_and_tilde sends command + grave_accent_and_tilde (cmd+`)
Hold left_command and press equal_sign in layer_44 to increase current window size (raycast)
tapping left_shift in layer_44 will send left_shift + left_command
tapping left_control in layer_44 will send left_control + left_command
tapping left_option in layer_44 will send left_option + left_command
tapping tab in layer_44 will send left_command + tab
Tapping 'c' in layer_44 will enter layer_44c
Tap c in layer_44c to send command + c
tapping 'd' in layer_44 will increase the volume
tapping 'd' in layer_44d will send volume up (volume_increment)
tapping 'h' in layer_44 will send left_command + h for context-sensitive actions (Cursor, Excel, or default)
tapping 'h' in layer_44 will send left_shift + left_option + h
tapping 'i' in layer_44 will enter layer_44i
Tap 'i' in this layer to surround the word under the cursor or the word to the left with curly braces

In 'layer_44j', pressing 'j' sends control + shift + j
In 'layer_44' and Cursor AI app, tap 'k' to first enter layer_44k and then send control + shift + k
In 'layer_44k', pressing 'j' sends control + shift + j
In 'layer_44k', pressing 'k' sends control + shift + k
Tap 'l' in this layer to move to the right five times, used in Excel Virtual Machine
Tap 'm' in this layer to enter layer_44m
Tap 'm' in this layer to TODO
